This release version is outdated! Find the current version
here
.
Release LTS.434.2 of October 18, 2024
New features
1. The hotkeys support when working with registries and instance profiles was added.
2. Now the number of instances can be optionally displayed in the
registry grouping
.
In the
"Table" dashboard
, it is now possible to create a combined header for table columns similarly to
object registries
.
1. In the eDoc module, when working in version comparison mode, displaying the user who made the change to the document was added.
2. Files can now be uploaded via the Edoc document registry interface.
The
traceId
label was added to the log to ease searching for records related to a single operation.
Changes and improvements
Checking the uniqueness of attribute values included in a restriction or key, while simultaneously saving several objects with the same values was stabilized.
The display of the registry with fixed columns when scrolling was optimized.
The filtering operation in the registry when changing the filter type was stabilized.
The process of transferring the registry visual using GUF files was improved.
The display of the
"Status Bar" widget
was stabilized.
It is now possible to display an instance profile in the
communication panel
when selecting it in the
"Object registry" widget
.
The operation of
batch action
when using the
"Object registry" widget
was stabilized.
The option to add the "Loading local objects from Excel" user interface module to
batch action
was added.
The
attrOldValue
function was improved.
The display of additional task attributes for the mobile application and web-version according to the application field was added.
In the business process task profile, the display of the attribute highlighting style for selecting the responsible was improved.
The operation of data sources based on requests with comments was optimized.
Now the user who installed the update is recorded in the action audit and the display of records depending on the selected language was optimized.
eDoc improvements: the display of the document history when another user creates a new version and entering text in the table cells was improved; a notification about the creation of a new version of the document was added.
In the GreenData Meet, the sound quality for several users simultaneously turning on microphones was improved.
The operation of child attributes with
"OnChanged" event
was improved.
The registry search filters for "String" and "Text" attributes was stabilized.
Widget transferring using GUFs with
"Title by attribute" widget
and
"Status bar" widget
widgets was stabilized.
Attaching files in the System was stabilized.
The backward compatibility for "Setting buttons on the control panel in the registry" object type instances was improved.
In the
GreenData Messenger
, receiving messages from a chat with a telegram bot was optimized.
The unification of modal windows in the System was implemented.
Registry settings for the "File Storage" object type [FS_STORAGE] and instance visuals were improved.
The display of analytical source fields when setting up the previosuly created tables in
The "Dynamics chart" dashboard
dashboard was improved.
